name: XmlStreamWriter

constructors.name: XmlStreamWriter
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the XmlStreamWriter class.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes this instance of an XmlStreamWriter and free any resources associated with it.

methods.name: getXmlString
methods.description: Returns the XML written by the XmlStreamWriter instance.

methods.name: setDefaultNamespace
methods.description: Binds the specified URI to the default namespace. This URI is bound in the scope of the current START_ELEMENT â€“ END_ELEMENT pair.

methods.name: writeAttribute
methods.signature: public Void writeAttribute(String prefix, String namespaceUri, String localName, String value)
methods.description: Writes an attribute to the output stream.

params.name: value
params.description: Specifies the name of the attribute.

methods.name: writeCData
methods.description: Writes the specified CData to the output stream.

methods.name: writeCharacters
methods.description: Writes the specified text to the output stream.

methods.name: writeComment
methods.description: Writes the specified comment to the output stream.

methods.name: writeDefaultNamespace
methods.description: Writes the specified namespace to the output stream.

methods.name: writeEmptyElement
methods.signature: public Void writeEmptyElement(String prefix, String localName, String namespaceUri)
methods.description: Writes an empty element tag to the output stream.

params.name: namespaceUri
params.description: Specifies the name of the tag to be written.

methods.name: writeEndDocument
methods.description: Closes any start tags and writes corresponding end tags to the output stream.

methods.name: writeEndElement
methods.description: Writes an end tag to the output stream, relying on the internal state of the writer to determine the prefix and local name.

methods.name: writeNamespace
methods.signature: public Void writeNamespace(String prefix, String namespaceUri)
methods.description: Writes the specified namespace to the output stream.

methods.name: writeProcessingInstruction
methods.signature: public Void writeProcessingInstruction(String target, String data)

methods.name: writeStartDocument
methods.signature: public Void writeStartDocument(String encoding, String version)
methods.description: Writes the XML Declaration using the specified XML encoding and version.

methods.name: writeStartElement
methods.signature: public Void writeStartElement(String prefix, String localName, String namespaceUri)
methods.description: Writes the start tag specified by localName to the output stream.

description: The XmlStreamWriter class provides methods for writing XML data.
